Message: hey so sad news I hadn't slept all night because of my insomnia and I feel like I have zero energy today I might pass out any second can we postpone it

Of course, I understand your exhaustion affects focus. Let's reschedule when you're well-rested, taking care of yourself is key. We'll look forward to a more energized session then. Stay positive, rest well.

Hey so sadly I didn't get to sleep all night because of my insomnia so I have zero energy today, and i feel like I might pass out any second would it  be possible if we postpone trainig session to tomorrow?
Absolutely, insufficient rest impacts performance. It's wise to prioritize recovery. Let's plan for a refreshed day tomorrow, ready to give our best. Take good care and rest deeply tonight.
on the way here my public transportation got into a terrible accident and the boss flipped sideways making other people fall on me I think I broke my leg and I can't move

Oh dear, first priority is your health and safety. Don't attempt to move, seek medical help immediately. Once stable, we'll revisit training plans with patience and understanding. Be strong, take care. I'm really scared right now, I don't know what to do
